review: I like it very much. Works great!
author: Patti Guidry

review: I liked the RUKU BETTER! Easier to follow guide and more free channels! Remote was bigger but it didn't get stuckike the firestick remote did! Firestick was all hype!  Get the RUKU!
author: Cheryl Kwon

review: I ordered this and could not get it programmed as the menu went only so far and would not continue. A call to Amazon resulted in several attempts but the agent admitted they are having a lot of issues with this product. They promised to call back in 48hrs but, of course, never did. I sent it back and will wait until the glitches are ironed out and maybe, try it again.
author: Kathleen Gross

review: I loved the FireTV, so I knew I would most likely like the stick. As expected it works perfectly and connects to pled, which is why I bought the FireTV in the first place. Far exceeds the AppleTV
author: Programgod "Eric Haensgen"

review: This product works great for me. I was skeptical about getting it because I read some reviews of poor internet connections, and my WIFI isn't the strongest and it works just fine!
author: Kendra Biel

review: It was so easy to hook up!  I love it!
author: ck

review: Great product specially with the remote. Well packaged. I removed my chromecast.
author: Eduardo R. Castaneda
